articles.description: Coverage of Bellator 301 as welterwight champion Yaroslav Amosov fights Jason Jackson.
articles.title: Bellator MMA - Bellator 301

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate refuses to criticise his players after Friday's lacklustre 2-0 win over Malta, but says his side are "not where we need to be".
articles.title: England 'not where we need to be' - Southgate

articles.description: Everton Football Club and their supporters will look to the 1994-95 side for relegation salvation.
articles.title: 'Dogs of War reborn' - Everton gear up for another challenge

articles.description: First practice at the Las Vegas Grand Prix is called off after just nine minutes of running because of a problem with a loose drain cover.
articles.title: Las Vegas first practice called off over drain cover

articles.description: Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill says there is "no benefit" in being "overly critical" of his young squad after a 4-0 defeat in Finland.
articles.title: No benefit in being overly critical - O'Neill

articles.description: Sale Sharks hold off a spirited Newcastle Falcons fightback to go top of the Premiership.
articles.title: Sale hold off Newcastle to go top of Premiership

articles.description: Relive five great moments from the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup, including Glenn Maxwell's double century, Virat Kohli's record and Angelo Matthews' controversial timed-out dismissal.
articles.title: Relive five great moments from the Cricket World Cup

articles.description: Emma Hayes tells Mauricio Pochettino to wait as she takes a phone call from Sir Alex Ferguson after it was announced she will leave Chelsea.
articles.title: Hayes makes Pochettino wait to take call from Ferguson

articles.description: With Everton's record 10-point Premier League deduction, BBC Sport look at other incidents where clubs in England have been hit by similar punishments.
articles.title: What other big points deductions have there been?

articles.description: England's Richard Illingworth and Richard Kettleborough are chosen to umpire Sunday's Cricket World Cup final.
articles.title: English duo chosen as World Cup final umpires
